Flow.description: Opening Questionnaire for agents to pull in general starting questions for Cases and route them to the appropriate Case Flow | Added a new consent script | Added a tweak to the script line breaks requested by intake management

formulas.name: fx_Opening_DQ_CQC_Details
formulas.expression: IF({!Do_you_agree_to_provide_accurate_information} = "No", "Client said they do not wish to provide accurate information", IF({!Have_you_previously_signed_documents_either_physically_or_electronically_regardi} = "Yes", "Client said that they are currently working with another firm", IF({!Do_you_have_authority_to_sign_on_behalf_of_the_Injured_Party} = "No", "Client said that they do not have authority to sign on behalf of the injured party", IF ({!Are_you_the_Next_of_Kin_NOK} = "No" && ({!Are_you_the_Executor_of_Estate_EOE} = "No"), "Client said that they are neither the NOK nor the EOE (They cannot sign on behalf of the injured party)", "" ))))

formulas.name: fx_Opening_DQ_CQC_Reason
formulas.expression: IF({!Do_you_agree_to_provide_accurate_information} = "No", "Does not agree to provide accurate information", IF({!Have_you_previously_signed_documents_either_physically_or_electronically_regardi} = "Yes", "Working with another firm", IF({!Do_you_have_authority_to_sign_on_behalf_of_the_Injured_Party} = "No", "Not Power of Attorney", IF ({!Are_you_the_Next_of_Kin_NOK} = "No" && ({!Are_you_the_Executor_of_Estate_EOE} = "No"), "Not Formal Next of Kin", "" ))))

Flow.label: SRLG | General | Opening Questionnaire

screens.description: NOTE, I only need one DQ display moving forward if I am to make the rest of the fields contingent on the previous responses. This should help simplify things.
screens.name: Opening_Information
screens.label: Opening Information

fields.name: Opener_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Opening Questions

fields.name: Opening_Script
fields.fieldText: Opening Script (Click arrow to shrink when done)

fields.name: Intro_Script_1
fields.fieldText:
Hi, I am looking for {!Get_Intake_at_Start.litify_pm__Client__r.Name} regarding their potential {!Get_Intake_at_Start.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name} legal case. My name is {!$User.FirstName}, and I am from Saddle Rock Legal Group/Legal Injury Advocates on a recorded line. Am I speaking with {!Get_Intake_at_Start.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__First_Name__c}? Great, how is your day going?


I have a few follow-up questions to see how we can help you with your potential {!Get_Intake_at_Start.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name} case. Before we get started, I have a quick disclaimer to read – Please be advised this call may be recorded for quality and training purposes, and the recording will be subject to third-party AI call analytics software. Additionally, your responses will be recorded exactly as you state them and reviewed by our staff and counsel. The information you provide is very important should you have a case. You may be asked to verify your responses by affidavit, so your complete honesty is crucial. Do you agree to provide accurate information to the best of your knowledge?"


Also, you agree to receive automated text notifications and phone calls by or on behalf of Saddle Rock to the number you are calling from regarding your potential case, please clearly say “Yes.” Your consent is not a condition of purchase.

fields.name: Do_you_agree_to_provide_accurate_information
fields.fieldText: Do you agree to provide accurate information?

fields.name: DQ_Accurate_Info
fields.fieldText:
I understand your concerns, {!Get_Intake_at_Start.litify_pm__Client__r.Name}. However, in order for us to proceed, we do need your consent to contact you. The attorneys may need to reach out from time to time with important updates or to ask questions regarding your case.

Without your consent, we wouldn’t be able to move forward in assisting you. Would you be open to reconsidering so we can proceed?


(If they still refuse:)


﻿UNFORTUNATELY THEY ARE DQ

"I completely respect your decision. Unfortunately, without your consent to be contacted, we won’t be able to move forward with your potential case. If you change your mind, feel free to reach out to us. Thank you for your time here at Saddle Rock Legal Group!"

value.stringValue: JUST TO CONFIRM: YOU ARE SUBMITTING A CLAIM FOR... (View Drop Down to Review Case Type Options)

fields.name: Have_you_previously_signed_documents_either_physically_or_electronically_regardi
fields.fieldText: Have you previously signed documents, either physically or electronically, regarding this particular matter with any other law firm?

fields.name: DQ_3
fields.fieldText:
UNFORTUNATELY THEY ARE DQ

Please Read: “Unfortunately, we cannot accept your potential case at this time. As such, we are not able to represent you and will not be filing a lawsuit on your behalf. This does not mean you don’t have a case. Please consider contacting another law firm for a second opinion. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us at Saddle Rock Legal Group. Have a great day!”


**Note to Agent: If the caller asked 'why', it’s okay to simply state that 'There’s a current lack of evidence to fit our case criteria.' No further details than that.
